events.message: We have received the application from John Doe for the software engineer position at our company.
John Doe's application was reviewed and categorized under the engineering department based on his skills and experience.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to handle John Doe's candidacy for the software engineer role.
Initial screening call was conducted successfully with John Doe; he demonstrated strong knowledge of software development principles.
John Doe responded promptly to the interview invitation and confirmed availability for the technical interview.
The technical interview with John Doe was scheduled for June 5th at 10 AM to assess his coding and problem-solving skills.
John Doe completed the technical interview and performed well on all coding challenges and system design questions.
HR interview was scheduled to take place on June 7th to evaluate cultural fit and discuss benefits with John Doe.
John Doe completed the HR interview, expressing enthusiasm for the role and alignment with company values.
An official offer was proposed to John Doe including salary, benefits, and start date for the software engineer position.
John Doe provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
John Doe accepted the offer officially, confirming his start date and excitement to contribute to the software development projects.
John Doe began onboarding at the company, attending orientation sessions and setting up his development environment.
The hiring process for John Doe was successfully closed as he fully integrated into the engineering team.
